tool.name: SAGA.pointcloud_tools.14
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPC_LIST True output_data_PC $output_data_PC name SAGA.pointcloud_tools.14 PC_LIST $PC_LIST INDEX $INDEX prefer $prefer response $response outputType_PC $OutputSection_PC.outputType_PC transmissionMode_PC $OutputSection_PC.transmissionMode_PC

param.name: PC_LIST
param.label: Point Cloud List
param.help: The input point cloud list. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-lasf

param.name: INDEX
param.label: Index
param.help: The list index of the point cloud to pick. Indices start at zero.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_PC
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_PC
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Main use of this tool is to support tool chain development, allowing to pick a single point cloud from a point cloud list.<br/>
